name: 1000 Daggers
description:
I'm so proud of this silly little dodge reflex game I made with the help of the guys at blackthorneprod and their Unity course.  Never would have thought myself able to create a game with all my own art assets without their guidance.  Enjoy trying to prevent Bandicat from getting skewered!  

Credits

Unity Course - https://www.udemy.com/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-course/ 

Sounds from freesound.org including: https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/415209/
